message: Let's start with a generous offer, Bob! Accept and we can shake on it.
You're being too generous, Alice! I'll take this offer.
I'm willing to meet you halfway, Bob. Let's split the difference!
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'll take the majority.
I'm not getting any younger, Bob. Let's get this over with. I'll give you a slightly larger share, but I'm not getting taken advantage of!
You're running out of time, Alice. I'm taking what's left.
